issues.title: Sample: Request An AC over An Existing Bearer
issues.author: sbarguil

comments.author: boucadair
comments.body: Agree that it is useful to consider modeling the bearers as part of the service creation. This is the intent of https://github.com/boucadair/attachment-circuit-model/issues/5

comments.author: boucadair
comments.body: Handled as part of the service model

issues.title: Bearer: missing customer port in "customer point" section
issues.author: Ivan-Bykov-RBBN

issues.title: Bearer: add to model physical information of the connectivity
issues.author: Ivan-Bykov-RBBN
issues.body:
- crossing id and fiber parameters
- microwave line id with port id
- l2 or l3 leased service id 
- id of additional switch in the middle, not controlled by "customer" or "provider"

issues.title: Bearer: add provider parameters
issues.author: Ivan-Bykov-RBBN
issues.body:
PE parameters in bearer ( inherited from 3GPP TS28.541 where is mentioned PE paramenters NextHopInfo)     
         +--rw provider-point
        add provider port id 
         |  +--rw device
         |  |  +--rw device-id?   string   ---FQDN
        add location of PE section
